channel.title: Can any1 tell me all the admin commands
channel.description: pls and ty. and cud u possible tell me how to ban/ip ban/become invisible. tyvm. :o[br][size=1]Posted on: January 03, 2007, 09:49:54 PM[/size][hr]Come on sum1? sum1 must know a few? sorry if i put this in the wrong section or if this is spam...

item.title: Can any1 tell me all the admin commands
item.dc:creator: @Devon Devon
item.description:
@Devon wrote:

It depends on the source.

some commands you can try are:

::god
::superjump (usually needs to be manually added)
::getpass
::banuser/::ban
::macrowarn
::kick
::mute

Read full topic

item.title: Can any1 tell me all the admin commands
item.description:
@1080 wrote:

to become invisible its a pnpc command dont remmeber heres a simple banning mode script

	if(command.startsWith("ban"))
                    {
                    String victim = command.substring(4);
			PlayerHandler.kickNick = victim;
			victim = victim.replace(" ", "_");
                    System.out.println("Admin:"+playerName+" is banning "+victim);
			PlayerHandler.messageToAll = victim+"has been BANNED.";
			appendToBanned(victim);
                    }}

put that under admin commands simple but it does work

Read full topic
